name: Solitaire TriPeaks Card Game
description:
Solitaire TriPeaks is a fun twist on the classic card game you love. If you’re a fan of Klondike or Freecell - you’ll love Solitaire TriPeaks!

It's like Spider Solitaire or Pyramid Solitaire taken to a whole new level! Unleash the adventure with the newest version of solitaire.

Here are the top 3 reasons people love playing Solitaire TriPeaks:

● The more you play, the more daily bonus points you’ll receive.
● With every new island you discover, there are free bonuses waiting for you!
● Plus, it’s totally free to play!

Your gaming skills will be put to the test as you play against the clock to win coins and the chance to discover new levels with your guide Tiki and his adorable dog Poi. Then as you progress you’ll get to disarm traps, trigger boosters and uncover thrilling hidden cards!

If you love to play in a group you can compete against your friends with weekly leaderboard challenges. Or if you’re a fan of playing solo then Solitaire TriPeaks is a great way to challenge yourself. Progress quickly, win fast and have an amazing time doing it! With over 2000 levels to discover - there’s no limit to the fun waiting for you. Become the king of Solitaire Tripeaks today!

Download now to start earning points in an instant. Begin your exciting adventure with Solitaire TriPeaks!
